About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do

I always do my best

I am the 3rd year student at Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań. For one semester I gained knowledge in Spain at Universidade da Coruña thanks to the Erasmus+ program. The same I proved myself that I can find my way in a new situation, act in stress, and my language skills significantly increased.

I am interested in front-end technologies, I am fluent in HTML and CSS, I know Sass, JavaScript and React but I work regularly on broadening my knowledge and skills in this field. Furthermore, my biggest hobbies are sport, food and travels. I am a perfectionist, that’s why I always try to perform tasks as well as it possible.
